com.uncopt.android.widget.text.justify.J.android:text: 'The University of Rajasthan strives to give equal importance and keep close to our wider student communities of interest. Today there is widespread knowledge everywhere with newer technologies, skills and avenues emerging. The horizons of professional activities are expanding and hence today there is much more scope for the younger generations to uncape their talents and touch greater heights of achievements. However, it is my duty to warn 'Be careful of the Internet. It is of course extremely useful for research and communication. However,some have allowed the cyber world to so dominate their source of information that a lot of downloaded data was just skipped through without in depth analysis'. I am extremely happy to know that UNIRAJ mobile application is going to be available on University website for University community and public and will be extremely useful for student community in keeping touch with the latest developments on dynamic level. I congratulate the effort of the development team members and welcome all to use the mobile application. '
